sentences.cn: 分光镜之于化学的革命。

sentences.en: Double measurement normalized PAS avoided the influence from the spectroscope.
sentences.cn: 采用二次测量归一化方法避免了分束器的影响.

sentences.en: From this , about 1750, the spectroscope was developed.
sentences.cn: 大约在1750年, 据此发展了分光镜.

sentences.en: He drew a line on the chart; The substance produced characteristic lines on the spectroscope.
Inside the aircraft a spectroscope would "read" the data and record where the bacteria around land mines is located.
sentences.cn: 飞机里面的分光镜“读出”数据，并记录下地雷周围细菌的具体位置。

sentences.en: Precision values of atomic masses are measured in a device called a mass spectroscope.
sentences.cn: 原子质量的精确值是用一种称为质谱仪的装置来测量的.

sentences.en: The specialty pigment in the CarSecure stickers can be checked using a special hand-held spectroscope, which employs optical and acoustical signals to indicate whether the sticker is genuine.
sentences.cn: 有种特别的手持分光镜可以检测出车用安全贴纸中的特殊的色素，可以使用光学的，声学的信号来显示出安全贴纸的真假。

sentences.en: The spectroscope shows the center of the galaxy as a white band and the movement of stars around the core is traced by a dark vertical line.
sentences.cn: 从分光镜中可以看到，星系中心象一条白带，而星体围绕中心的旋转则描绘成一条黑色的垂直线。

words.tran_cn: 光谱测定的；度谱的；分光仪的；能谱仪的

trans.tran_en: an instrument used for forming and looking at spectra
